channel.title: PHP error... please help
channel.description:
I get this error: [code]Parse error: syntax error, unexpected T_VARIABLE, expecting ',' or ';' in /home/.blotch/kelleykid/randomofftopic.com/moparsite/news.inc on line 33[/code]
About the below line:
[code]$comment_query = "SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments WHERE news_id={$row['id']}";[/code]
What I have tried:
[code]$comment_query = 'SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments', 'WHERE news_id={$row[id]}';[/code]
[code]$comment_query = 'SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments', 'WHERE news_id={$row['id']}';[/code]
[code]$comment_query = "SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments", "WHERE news_id={$row[id]}";[/code]
[code]$comment_query = SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments WHERE news_id={$row[id]};[/code]
Please help me. :)
-Alexia

item.title: PHP error... please help
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

… okay?

I meant… It was supposed to post news, but it didn’t because I didn’t tell it to yet.

I did now though and it works GREAT!

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: PHP error... please help
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“alexia, post:7, topic:158444”]Thanks. I got all the errors sorted out. Now I just need to figure out why it won’t do what it’s supposed to do. <_<

-Alexia[/quote]
php does what its told to do…

its like any programming language (ya ya…php is scripting but stfu)

its not like php or java goes “hmmm blah++…lets make it blah-- just to be a bitch!”

item.title: PHP error... please help
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

echo ‘

<a href="’ . $_SERVER[‘PHP_SELF’] . ‘"?action=show&id=’ . $row[‘id’] . '">Comments ’ . $comment_row[0] . ‘’;

I believe that should work. Add me on MSN/AIM if you find it easier than posting here.

Read full topic

item.title: PHP error... please help
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Lol. I feel stupid…

New Error:

Parse error: syntax error, unexpected T_STRING in ______ on line 38

Line:

echo ('<tr><td><a href="{$_SERVER['PHP_SELF']}?action=show&id={$row['id']}">Comments</a> ($comment_row[0]}</td></tr>');

Thanks for the help,

-Alexia

Read full topic

@xxlegitxx wrote:

It gives an error when you use an array variable within double quotes, I believe.

$comment_query = "SELECT * FROM news_comments WHERE news_id = " . $row[‘id’];

item.title: PHP error... please help
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

I get this error:

Parse error: syntax error, unexpected T_VARIABLE, expecting ',' or ';' in /home/.blotch/kelleykid/randomofftopic.com/moparsite/news.inc on line 33

About the below line:

$comment_query = "SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments WHERE news_id={$row['id']}";

What I have tried:

$comment_query = 'SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments', 'WHERE news_id={$row[id]}';
$comment_query = 'SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments', 'WHERE news_id={$row['id']}';
$comment_query = "SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments", "WHERE news_id={$row[id]}";
$comment_query = SELECT count(*) FROM news_comments WHERE news_id={$row[id]};

Please help me.

-Alexia
